NK040(thi)057:3: dbus phyogs de bzhin rigs kyi dur khrod nas chos
NK040(thi)057:4: dbyings ye shes me dpung 'bar ba 'di lan gcig
NK040(thi)057:5: dbus kyi phyogs su 'phros me lce dkar po chos
NK040(thi)057:6: dbyings chen po gdal ye shes me sgra 'brug ltar
NK040(thi)057:7: ldir sprul pa'i me lce glog ltar 'gyur yang sprul
NK040(thi)057:8: tsha tsha skar ltar 'khrug me lce 'bar ba 'ur
NK040(thi)057:9: 'ur chem chem sgrog sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang
NK040(thi)057:10: de 'dra ste mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad
NK040(thi)057:11: dang dma' sa 'og lto 'phye yan chad kyi phrin
NK040(thi)057:12: las rnam bzhi 'grub gyur cig rtsa sngags /
NK040(thi)057:14: shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi dur khrod nas me
NK040(thi)057:15: long ye shes me dpung 'bar ba 'di lan cig
NK040(thi)057:16: shar gyi phyogs su 'phros me lce dkar po'i stong
NK040(thi)057:17: gsum gang me zhags dkar po me long chen po
NK040(thi)057:18: gdal ye shes me sgra 'brug ltar ldir sprul pa'i
NK040(thi)057:19: me lce glog ltar 'gyu yang sprul tsha tsha skar
NK040(thi)057:20: ltar 'khrug me skad 'bar ba 'u ru ru rdo
NK040(thi)057:21: rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang de 'dra ste mtho srid
NK040(thi)057:22: pa'i rtse mo man chad dang dma' sa 'og lto
NK040(thi)057:23: 'phye yan chad kyis zhi ba'i phrin las 'grub gyur
NK040(thi)057:25: lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi dur khrod nas mnyam
NK040(thi)057:26: nyid ye shes me dpung 'bar ba 'di lan gcig
NK040(thi)057:27: lho yi phyogs su 'phros me lce ser po'i stong
NK040(thi)057:28: gsum gang me zhags ser po mnyam nyid chen po
NK040(thi)057:29: gdal ye shes me sgra 'brug ltar ldir sprul pa'i
NK040(thi)057:30: me lce glog ltar 'gyu yang sprul tsha tsha skar
NK040(thi)057:31: ltar 'khrug me skad 'bar ba 'ur 'ur chem chem
NK040(thi)057:32: sgrog rin chen mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang de 'dra ste
NK040(thi)057:33: mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang dma' sa
NK040(thi)057:34: 'og lto 'phye yan chad kyis rgyas pa'i phrin las
NK040(thi)057:36: h'u nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi dur khrod nas sor
NK040(thi)057:37: rtogs ye shes me dpung 'bar ba 'di lan cig
NK040(thi)057:38: nub kyi phyogs su 'phros me lce dmar po'i stong
NK040(thi)057:39: gsum gang me zhags dmar po sor rtogs chen po
NK040(thi)057:40: gdal ye shes me sgra 'brug ltar ldir sprul pa'i
NK040(thi)057:41: me lce glog ltar 'gyu yang sprul tsha tsha skar
NK040(thi)057:42: ltar 'khrug me skad 'bar ba 'ur 'ur chem chem
NK040(thi)057:43: sgrog pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang de 'dra ste mtho
NK040(thi)057:44: srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang dma' sa 'og
NK040(thi)057:45: lto 'phye yan chad kyis dbang gi phrin las 'grub
NK040(thi)057:47: h'u byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi dur khrod nas
NK040(thi)057:48: bya grub ye shes me dpung 'bar ba 'di len
NK040(thi)057:49: gcig byang gi phyogs su 'phros me lce ljang ku'i
NK040(thi)057:50: stong gsum gang me zhag ljang gu bya grub chen
NK040(thi)057:51: po gdal ye shes me sgra 'brug ltar ldir sprul
NK040(thi)057:52: pa'i me lce glog ltar 'gyu yang sprul tsha tsha
NK040(thi)057:53: skar ltar 'khrug me skad 'bar ba 'ur 'ur chem
NK040(thi)057:54: chem sgrog las kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang de 'dra
NK040(thi)057:55: ste mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang dma'
NK040(thi)057:56: sa 'og lto 'phye yan chad kyis drag po'i phrin
NK040(thi)057:57: las 'grub gyur cig +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki
NK040(thi)057:58: ni kro ti ka li bam ha ri ni sa
NK040(thi)057:59: h'u phata gnod byed nad 'dre gdon bgegs za 'dre
NK040(thi)057:60: shi gshed srog gcod dbugs len thams cad ag+ne ye
NK040(thi)057:61: dz+wa la ram ram ni tri ma ra ya rbad
